name: Fangshan Xinxing Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Fangshan Huifeng Xinxing Coal Industry Company
Shanxi Huifeng Industrial Coking Coal Group

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B9%E5%B1%B1%E6%B1%87%E4%B8%B0%E6%96%B0%E6%98%9F%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Fangshan Xinxing Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Haojiayan, Yukou Town, Fangshan County, Luliang City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Fangshan Huifeng Xinxing Coal Industry Company
owners: Shanxi Huifeng Industrial Coking Coal Group
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Fangshan Huifeng Xinxing Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Shanxi Huifeng Industrial Coking Coal Group.
